content.question: In lines 2-3, the clause ut...exigat specifies

choices.label: what the purpose of the marriage is
when the marriage will be arranged
how the ceremony should be carried out

content.answer: what the purpose of the marriage is

unit.text: 6: Course Project and Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
